title: Dire Wolf

properties.value: Dire Wolves are one of the stronger species of wolf found in Isafdar, near the limestone mine and Lletya. Four can also be found on Mynydd, with one of them being albino.

Dire Wolves are one of the stronger species of wolf found in Isafdar, near the limestone mine and Lletya. Four can also be found on Mynydd, with one of them being albino.

As with all wolves, their bones may be used with a chisel to create wolfbone arrowtips for use in Big Chompy Bird Hunting.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The examine text of the regular dire wolf is a reference to the fairytale Little Red Riding Hood.
    • Similarly the examine text of the albino wolf appears to be a reference to another fairytale Snow White.
